member.name: M:DemoWebApiProject.Controllers.GameProgressDemoController.GetAllGameProgresses
member.summary: Get all game progresses with all their game progress on platform subclasses
member.returns: Return an enumerable of game progress Dtos

member.name: M:DemoWebApiProject.Controllers.GameProgressDemoController.GetASpecificGameProgress(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get a game progress with all its game progress on platform subclasses by the game id. Capable of throwing an exception here to test the Internal Server Error
member.param: Throw an exception here to test the Internal Server Error. Default value is false

member.name: M:DemoWebApiProject.Controllers.GameProgressDemoController.GetAllGameProgressesOfASpecificGame(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a list of game progress on platform subclasses for a certain game, by game ID. The only difference between this API and "GetASpecificGameProgress" is that this one will return an enumerable of game progress on platform Dtos instead
member.returns: return an enumerable of game progress on platform Dtos

member.name: M:DemoWebApiProject.Controllers.GameProgressDemoController.GetASpecificGameProgressOfASpecificGame(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get one specific game progress on platform subclass for a certain game, by game ID and gameProgressOnPlatformId. This API will return 404 if the gameProgressOnPlatformId doesn't match with the game ID
member.returns: return a game progress on platform Dto

member.name: M:DemoWebApiProject.Controllers.GameProgressDemoController.CreateAGameProgressForASpecificGame(DemoWebApiProject.Models.GameProgressOnPlatformDto)
member.summary: Post a new gameProgressOnPlatformDto to the database. This API will read the Dto content and decide which Game Progress entity this gameProgressOnPlatformDto belongs to. And update the database.
member.returns: returns the gameProgressOnPlatformDto to be created

member.name: M:DemoWebApiProject.Controllers.GameProgressDemoController.DeleteAGameProgressForASpecificGame(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a certain gameProgressOnPlatform record from the database. This API will return 404 if the gameProgressOnPlatformId doesn't match with the game ID
member.returns: Will return a 204 status code if the deletion is successful

member.name: M:DemoWebApiProject.Controllers.GameProgressDemoController.DeleteMultipleGameProgresses(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete multiple gameProgressOnPlatform recorsd from the database
member.returns: Will return a 204 status code if no Internal Servicer Error is found
